abstract: The company that operates the Grangemouth complex is seeking concessions from a union that is protesting the treatment of a labor representative.
snippet: The company that operates the Grangemouth complex is seeking concessions from a union that is protesting the treatment of a labor representative.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — A labor action that began Monday at the huge Grangemouth refinery and petrochemical complex in Scotland could threaten the future of the unprofitable plant, analysts said.

headline.main: Union Action at Scottish Refinery Could Escalate
headline.print_headline: Union Action at Scottish Refinery Could Escalate
